Job ID: 93
Raw description:  Find Jobs Company Reviews Find Salaries Find Resumes Employers / Post Job Upload your resume Sign in See more recommended jobs About Help Centre Great opportunity for a new Grad to gain valuable knowledge and experience in a Brake Press Programming role. Ideal candidate has worked with Gasperini machines. START IMMEDIATELY!! TEMP TO PERM East Brampton RESPONSIBILITIES · Must ensure machine safety rules are followed (light curtains, guarding, etc.)· Assure that 1st off/1st Part is inspected and meets Quality Assurance requirements· Bend parts according to provided drawings and specifications· Completion of data entry and/or paperwork as required· Program, set up Machines to meet customer requirements in output and quality· Interface with Quality and Engineering· All other duties as assigned by Supervisors and Managers COMPETENCIES (Job Knowledge/Skill, Education and related experience) · Experience with Metal Fabrication an asset· Ability to read drawings, blueprints and specifications· Ability to use Tape Measure, Vernier and other measuring tools· Ability to identify and change Brake Press tools· Ability to work independently or with supervision· Capable to lift up to 50lbs or 23 kilograms from ground to table level· Mathematical aptitude For this great opportunity please send your resume directly. Looking for candidates flexible to train on days and move to nights or afternoon shift. BM01 Job Type: Full-time Salary: $20.00 /hour
